dcterms:description: The PTB Database is a repository of cardiologist-annotated ECGs of diverse cardiological conditions, including myocardial infarction (MI), frequently used for MI research.
dcterms:title: PTB Database

dcterms:creator: P. Wagner
N. Strodthoff
R.-D. Bousseljot
D. Kreiseler
F.I. Lunze
W. Samek
T. Schaeffter
dcterms:description: PTB-XL is a large publicly available electrocardiography dataset comprising 21,837 10-second 12-lead ECG records from 18,885 patients with diverse diagnoses, including myocardial infarction.
dcterms:title: PTB-XL

dcterms:creator: G.B. Moody
R.G. Mark
dcterms:description: The MIT-BIH Arrhythmia Database consists of 48 half-hour excerpts of two-channel ambulatory ECG recordings of 47 subjects, widely used for the classification of cardiac arrhythmia.
dcterms:title: MIT-BIH Arrhythmia Database
